title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Stylized Forms", ca. 1930s
medium: Brush and brown and cream gouache, graphite on off-white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AV./N.Y.C.
dimensions:
21.9 x 13 cm (8 5/8 x 5 1/8 in.)
matted with -153
Mat:  40.6 x 50.8 cm (16 x 20 in.)
description: Abstract forms, possibly based on garden flora and implements, in white on dark brown (or black faded to brown) background

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Stylized Forms", ca. 1930s.
ca. 1930s. Brush and brown and cream gouache, graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-154.
